Reference

All functions

LDA_weight()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for LDA with weights

LDA_weight_tot()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for LDA topic-over-time with weights

diagnosis_alpha()

Show a diagnosis plot of alpha

diagnosis_model_fit()

Show a diagnosis plot of log-likelihood and perplexity

diagnosis_p()

Show a diagnosis plot of p

keyATM_idealpoint()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for Ideal Point Estimation Model

keyATM_model()

Initialize a keyATM model

keyATM_posterior()

Get posterior quantities from model output

keyATM_run()

Run a keyATM model

keyATM_train()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for the standard model

keyATM_train_HMM()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for the HMM model

keyATM_train_cov()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for the covariate model

keyATM_train_tot()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for the topic-over-time model

keyATM_train_totcov()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for the topic-over-time model with covariate

lda_cov()

Run the Collapsed Gibbs sampler for LDA Dir-Multi (Mimno and McCalum 2008)

posterior()

Get posterior (deprecated)

set_doc_names()

Set document names

set_topic_names()

Set topic names

top_docs()

Show the top documents for each topic

top_terms()

Show the top terms for each topic

top_topics()

Show the top topics for each document

topicdict_model()

Initialize a model (deprecated)

topicmodel_train()

Fit topic model (deprecated)

topicmodel_train_cov()

Fit topic model (deprecated)

topicmodel_train_tot()

Fit topic model (deprecated)

topicmodel_train_totcov()

Fit topic model (deprecated)
